## è®¡ç®—ç¤ºä¾‹: $B = \mathrm{End}(A)$

### $A$ çš„ AR quiver

{% def %}
è®°é—ä¼ ä»£æ•° $A = kQ$, $Q$ æ˜¯ä¸‹åˆ— Dynkin å›¾:

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
 &  & 2 &  & \\
 &  & \downarrow  &  & \\
1 & \rightarrow  & 4 & \leftarrow  & 3
\end{bmatrix}

### é APR tilting æ¨¡

{% ex %}

{% ex %}
ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯ $T$ tilting æ¨¡.

1. (æŠ•å°„ç»´åº¦). ç”±é—ä¼ ä»£æ•°, $p.\dim T â‰¤ 1$.
2. (ç›¸å¯¹å†…å°„ç»´åº¦). åªéœ€è¯æ˜ä¸å¯åˆ†è§£æŠ•å°„æ¨¡çš„ $ğšğğ(T)$-ç›¸å¯¹å†…å°„ç»´åº¦ $â‰¤1$. è®¡ç®—å¾—
   1. $0 â†’ {\color{Green}\substack{0\\0 \ 1 \ 0}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 0 \ 0}}} â†’ 0$;
   2. $0 â†’ {\color{Green}\substack{1\\0 \ 1 \ 0}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{1\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}}â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 0 \ 0}}} â†’ 0$;
   3. $0 â†’ {\color{Green}\substack{0\\0 \ 1 \ 1}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 1}}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 0 \ 0}}} â†’ 0$;
   4. $0 â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}} â†’ {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}} â†’ 0$.

3. (è‡ªå‚ç›´). ç”± $p.\dim T â‰¤ 1$, æ­¤æ—¶ $D\mathrm{Ext}^1(T,T) â‰ƒ \mathrm{Hom}(T, Ï„ T)$, å³,

    $$
    \mathrm{Hom}\left({\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}_A}âŠ• {\color{blue}\boxed{\substack{1\\1 \ 1 \ 0}}_B}âŠ•{ \color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 1 \ 1}} _C}âŠ•{ \color{blue}\boxed{\substack{0\\1 \ 0 \ 0}}_D}, {\color{Green}\substack{0\\0 \ 1 \ 1}} âŠ• {\color{Green}\substack{1\\0 \ 1 \ 0}} âŠ• {\color{Green}\substack{1\\0 \ 1 \ 1}\color{black}}\right).
    $$
  
    å¯¹ä»»æ„åˆ†é‡é—´çš„æ€å°„ $Ï†$, å¿…æœ‰ $Ï†_1 =0$, æ­¤æ—¶ $Ï†_4=0$. ç®€å•éªŒè¯çŸ¥ $Ï†_2$ ä¸ $Ï†_3$ æ’é›¶.

{% endex %}

{% ex %}
ä¸Šè¿° torsion pair æ˜¯ä¸è£‚çš„. ç‰¹åˆ«åœ°, æœ‰å…¸èŒƒåˆ†è§£

$$

$$

{% endex %}

{% ex %}
($\mathrm{End}_A(T_A)$). ä¸‹æ±‚ Tilting ä»£æ•° $B := \mathrm{End}(T_A)$. ä¾å®šä¹‰å°† $B$ å†™ä½œçŸ©é˜µä»£æ•° $(B_{i,j})_{1 â‰¤ i,j â‰¤ 4}$. ç›´æ¥è®¡ç®—å¾—

$$
B â‰ƒ \begin{pmatrix}
k\operatorname{id}_A & 0 & 0 & 0 \\
kf_{BA} & k\operatorname{id}_B & 0 & 0 \\
kf_{CA} & 0 & k\operatorname{id}_C & 0 \\
kf_{DA} & kf_{DB} & kf_{DC} & k\operatorname{id}_D. 
\end{pmatrix}
$$

ä»¥ä¸Š $f_{j,i}$ æ˜¯ $i â†’ j$ ç±»å‹çš„æ€å°„, å¯¹åº” quiver with relation:

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
    A & â†’ & B \\ 
    â†“ & â†» & â†“\\
    C & â†’ & D
\end{bmatrix}.
$$

{% endex %}

{% ex %}
($B$ çš„ AR quiver). $B$ çš„ AR quiver å¦‚ä¸‹ $\boxed{\substack {b \\ a \quad c \\ d}}$:

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯å‡ ç‚¹å‘ç°.
